cab.content: I T*r 507W WAR OA B IREIBB ALE3H QHB33?IOfl. 178Extract from "Pall Mall Gazette" BOth June 1918.' "QXiAPEAIvI Ogfflggj. Premier1g Message on Allan Question.X X X X X XMr. Greer has received the following letter:-Dear Mr. Greer,In answer to the inquiry, I am desired by the Prime Minister to say that he is himself examining into the whole question of the position of persons of enemy alien birth or connection in this country, and that he is determined...to take whatever action is shown to be necessary.Yours sincerely, (3d) "7, Sutherland. -3 Thitehall Gardens., J.V7., (*July 10th, 1918.
